thread.title: Emma

author: Emma
title: Emma
text: I ordered my dress- thankfully more than a month before my prom- because I did their sizing guide on the website and it said to get a large. I am normally a size medium in shirts/dresses and a size 4 in jeans. After putting in my measurements, it said that I needed an XL. I read some reviews saying that the sizing guide is way off, so I chose to get a medium instead. It came in and I definitely should have ordered a small because it is entirely too large. However, it is a beautiful dress and is nothing a bit of altering can't fix. It's a great place to find a dress, just go with what sizes you normally get or even a smaller size.
